MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG6 and DG7 areas of Kirkcudbright and Castle Douglas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:33am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required to a grounded overhead electricity line near Marks Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
